text: Song of the Sea () is a 1952 Brazilian drama movie directed by Alberto Cavalcanti and starring Luiz Andrade, Glauce Bandeira, Fernando Becker, DÃ©bora Borba, Margarida Cardoso, Ernani Dantas, Alfredo de Oliveria. ==Other websites== * Category:1952 drama movies Category:Brazilian movies Category:Movies set in Brazil Category:Movies directed by Alberto Cavalcanti
